entry.title: Axis Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 95.00

Our signature Axis Sports Bra is the new racerback silhouette. Inspired by the bound details of boxing wraps, this sports bra features contrasting matte and gloss ‚ wrap detailing which adds a new level of support. This performance bra has removable cups, built-in mesh lining for breathability, an elasticated hem and bonded seams for a smooth seamless feel. Suitable for high impact activities.

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small

Main: 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane, Gloss: 79% Polyamide 21% Elastane

entry.title: Axis Crop Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 95.00

This loose fitting sports tank designed as a layering style for wear in and out of the gym. A new take on the classic tank, this style features twisted boxing wrap-inspired panels and mesh to subtly highlight your sports bra, while also providing ventilation. Reflective triangles are placed at the back for visibility.

Main: 73% Polyamide 27% Elastane, Mesh: 80% Polyamide 20% Elastane

entry.title: Axis Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 95.00

The mahogany colour is back. This new racerback silhouette is inspired by the bound details of boxing wraps and it features contrasting matte and gloss ‚ wrap detailing which adds a new level of support and comfort. This performance bra has built-in inner mesh lining for breathability, an elasticated hem band for support and bonded seams to help you feel comfortable and confident during your next workout. Suitable for low-mid impact activities.

Model is 5'11, waist 24" and wears size small

Main: 59% Polyamide 41% Elastane, Gloss: 79% Polyamide 21% Elastane

entry.title: Axis Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Leggings
Price: 170.00

The mahogany colour is back. A full-length performance legging crafted from compressive fabric and finished with bonded seams and hem. The Axis leggings are inspired by the bound detailing of boxing wrap and feature contrasting matte and gloss lines that complement the compressive nature of the performance fabric. The high-rise bonded Svelte waistband features wrap paneling and reflective chevron details for visibility on your next run.¬†

Model is 5'11, waist 24" and wears size small.

Main:¬†59% Polyamide 41% Elastane, Gloss: 79% Polyamide 21% Elastane, Mesh: 71% Polyamide 29% Elastane.

Inner leg measurements: XS 68.5cm / S 69cm / M 69.5cm / L 70cm.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Leggings
Price: 170.00

This signature full-length performance legging is crafted from compressive fabric and finished with bonded seams and hem. The Axis leggings are inspired by the bound detailing of boxing wrap and feature contrasting matte and gloss lines that complement the compressive nature of the performance fabric. The high-rise bonded Svelte waistband features wrap paneling and reflective chevron details for visibility on your next run. 

Model is 5'11, waist 24" and wears size small.

entry.title: Stealth Sports Bra
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Sports Bras
Price: 95.00

The new Stealth sports bra is perfect for all gym work outs. Made from our new sustainable super-soft performance material, the Stealth Sports Bra has removable cups, halter neckline and mesh back. Fits true to size

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small

Main: 65% Recycled Polyamide/ 35% Elastane.

entry.title: Stealth Leggings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Leggings
Price: 170.00

The Stealth leggings are our new luxuriously soft, high performance yet understated leggings with minimal detailing and logos. The technology is all in this new sustainable material, and signature svelte waistband which feels super-soft to wear, yet supportive in all the right places.  These have been designed for women who are after high-performance with integrated technology - you can feel.  High visibility chevrons at the back waist band, mesh lower leg including a triangular cut hem detail and no back zip-pocket for stretching comfort.  

Sustainable fabrics are made in Italy 

Garment engineered in Portugal with heat sealed seams

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small.

Main: 65% Recycled Polyamide/35% Elastane

Inner leg length measurements: XS 68.5cm / S 69cm / M 69.5cm / L 70cm.

entry.title: Stealth One Piece
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Performance One Pieces
Price: 215.00

The new Stealth One-piece is the perfect workout all-in-one, detailed with a sleek combination of high gloss and matt recycled performance fabrics shaping the torso. The upper body has a built-in bra with removable bra cups and a mesh back for ventilation with high visibility signature chevron details.   Wear this for low-mid intensity workouts by itself or style it to-and-from the gym. 

Model is 5'10, waist 24" and wears size small. This style runs true to size. 

Fabrics made in Italy, 65% Recycled Polyamide, 35% Elastane. Garment made in Portugal.

entry.title: Mini Pivot Skirt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Outerwear
Price: 130.00

The Mini Pivot skirt is the perfect light-weight summer cover-up designed to be worn over our technical knit hotties, long leggings or one piece either at the gym or to take you to and from.  Available in limited numbers the Mini Pivot Skirt is a short mesh layering skirt, with a drawstring waistband to secure your perfect fit.  MAIN: 100% Polyester

Model is 5'10 / 182cm, waist 24” / 61cm, hips 34” / 86cm

The Mini Pivot skirt may re-shape when wet, should be hung when storing and drying.

entry.title: Technical Knit Sleeveless Tank
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Tops
Price: 65.00

Update your workout basics with the super-soft comfort of the Lucas Hugh circular knit, sustainable sleeveless t-shirt. Built with second skin Qnova polyamide, this classic sleeveless t-shirt is lightweight, breathable and has excellent moisture control. A foundational piece for any workout wardrobe. Made from 100% Qnova Polyamide - more than 50% recycled materials, and produced with lower emissions and reduced water consumption.

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size XS/S

entry.title: Technical Jumper Summer Weight
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Outerwear
Price: 180.00

The Technical Jumper is the perfect layer for all outdoor exercise, or as a light weight layer to take you to and from the gym. The jumper is moisture wicking, quick-drying and breathable with stretch. High visibility piping outlines mesh ventilation panels at the shoulder and under the arm which maintain air flow. Adjust the hem toggle for a straight or bagged over hem. Key pocket at the back.

The Technical Jumper is a sustainably made, trans-seasonal layering item made from 79% Recycled Polyamide, 21% Elastane

Model is 5'11/ 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small

entry.title: Technical Jumper Winter Weight
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lucas Hugh
Type: Outerwear
Price: 195.00

The Technical Jumper is the perfect layer for outdoor running or cycling in cooler months. The jumper has a fleece lining and wind shield exterior whilst moisture wicking and thermo regulating. High visibility piping outlines mesh ventilation panels at the shoulder and under the arm which maintain air flow. Adjust the hem toggle for a straight or bagged over hem. Key pocket at the back.

The Technical Jumper is a premium trans-seasonal layering item made from 50% Polyester, 42% Polyamide 8% Elastane

Model is 5'11 / 182cm, bust 32" / 76cm and wears size small
